ActIncome Tax Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Income Tax Regulations (2018 to 2022 Livestock Deferral)
PrecisRegulations Amending the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS (2018 to 2022 LIVESTOCK DEFERRAL) in order to prescribe the drought and excess moisture regions that are eligible for tax relief in the 2018 to 2022 taxation years.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0010 Publication Date: 2024-02-14
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS (2018 to 2022 LIVESTOCK DEFERRAL) in order to prescribe the drought and excess moisture regions that are eligible for tax relief in the 2018 to 2022 taxation years.
